BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application No. 20195065 HAX (Park and Elton Apartments) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law for approval of an Urban Development Action Area Project and for the approval of a real property tax exemption pursuant to Section 577 of Article XI of the Private Housing Finance Law, for real property located at Block 2381, Lot 43, Block 2418, Lot 6, Borough of the Bronx, Community Districts 1 and 3, Council District 17.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
